package.description: Contains a differential drive plugin that works with the eklavya robot model provided in the eklavya_description package. The plugin may also work for other differential drive robots. The purpose of this custom plugin is to build the ROS functionality directly into a proper Gazebo plugin, rather than a node that communicates with Gazebo.
package.author: Daniel Hewlett, Antons Rebguns, Jit Ray Chowdhury
